name: Limited Edition hand dyed and screened Love As Laughter T-Shirt
description:
We hand dyed and screened these Love As Laughter shirts to take with us on our NW micro tour and now we have decided to make them available online. The shirts have an old sun-faded look and super soft feel because of the process of dyeing and drying and rinsing. Pre-shrunk too! Great for chilling out and telling people you LOVE Love As Laughter or that you LOVE awesome t-shirts! very limited edition, available in 'darker still' (dirty orange, pink, grey) color scheme or 'light of love' (pink, orange).
Great gift! S,M,L, and XL available.

name: Tracks Of Quality Buddy System Double Tape Pack
description:
There's limited quantities left of these 2 co-released limited edition (of 100 each) cassettes, and so we are using the buddy system to get em to the party (that's your place)! contents - 

1- Lonnie Winn 'Beach Rock' 4 song cassette (value $5) 

-Sylvester and Tweety Bird give it 100 stars around your head. Sylvester says - 'I felt really relaxed, unfolded the lawn chair, looked at the sky, and let 'Beach Rock' take me straight to my old garage on the old shore road, where I used to practice with the guys before we'd ride bikes with one hand on our boards. Then I invented a cool new dance.'

check em out! http://lonniewinn.bandcamp.com/

2- Love As Laughter 'Greks II - Slight Return' 7 song cassette (value $7)

- a hot 17 years after the release of the ORIGINAL 'Greks Bring Gifts' comes 'Greks II' an ADHD fueled collection of new material from Sam Jayne and friends in the vein of the OG GREKS. 'I can't believe this is what passes for music these days' - Syd Barrett . You'll love it! 

- check it out! http://loveaslaughter.bandcamp.com/album/greks-ii-slight-return

You save on both tapes AND on shipping!

name: Lonnie Winn - 'Beach Rock' limited edition cassette
description:
Lonnie Winn $5
Beach Rock 4 Song Tape
Side A & B
1. Rally
2. Down The Line
3. Long Long Years
4. Lost in The Sea

Recorded by C. Amber 
Art by Ryan Iverson

name: Love As Laughter - The Greks II : Slight Return limited edition cassette
description:
An all new Love As Laughter adventure in the style of the original Greks Bring Gifts. On Limited Edition 7 - song cassette! There are only 100 of these produced in blue plastic, get yours today. 

Love As Laughter
Greks II : Slight Return
Side A : 
When I Murder
LZY SLDR III : Black Oups
Leaf Canopy
Negative Zero
Side B:
Every Midnite Song  (homebody vers) 
Holladaze
Seize Her (carpe diem)

Live and home studio recordings by Sam Jayne and co. 
All songs (c) Love As Laughter 2013

name: Limited Edition 'Big Pig' Poster by J Penry!
description:
This poster was only for sale at shows, but now it can be yours through the power of our internet sales department (1 employee).
Amazing weird printing technique!
Totally cool art!
Some are signed by different members of the band!
Take down that played out Joy Division poster and put up this one, your dorm room will thank you. 

Shipping Included!

name: Love As Laughter - Timers (7" Colored Vinyl)
description: Love As Laughter - Timers TOQ-10 Two brand new tracks from Love As Laughter! Timers b/w The One Around For Years Limited Edition Colored Vinyl 7" Single featuring original hand-silkscreened artwork from J. Penry Tracklist A. Timers B. The One Around For Years Label Trademark Of Quality 650 Copies Pink Vinyl 350 Copies Clear (First 350 Orders) For more art visit www.jpenry.com Recording specs! Recorded at Vacation Island Recordings Brooklyn NY 8/17-8/19, 8/26 2010 Produced by Love as Laughter & Matt Boynton Recorded by Matt Boynton Art by J Penry Personnel: Sam Jayne Sean Ragon Nic Gonzales Zeke Howard Christiana Key Steve Bartolomei

name: Love As Laughter - Smoking Pig T-Shirt
description:
Who doesn't love a smoking pig? 

White design on Purple or Grey (Sam's choice!) American Apparel T-Shirt.

Show the world you know what's up with this handsome piece of officially licensed LAL merch!

Artwork by J. Penry!

name: Love As Laughter - Destination 2000 (12" Vinyl)
description:
Love As Laughter's Destination 2000 12" LP on sumptuous black vinyl.

Only a few copies of this indie-rock landmark left! Produced by Phil Ek.

Side 1
1. Stay Out Of Jail
2. Aftermath
3. Margaritas
4. On The Run
5. Destination 2000

Side B
6. Stakes Avenue
7. Statuette
8. Freedom Cop
9. Demon Contacts
10. Body Double

Label: Sub Pop

Limited Quantities Available!

name: The Greks Bring Gifts (CD)
description:
Buy Greks Bring Gifts on CD sent to you direct from Sam Jayne's private reserve in Brooklyn. Contains "Singing Sores Make Perfect Swords" covered by Built to Spill on their 2000 Live album.

Track Listing:
1. It's Only Lena
2. TTFL
3. You Gotta Bug
4. I Keep Your Shade
5. Uninvited Trumpets
6. Next Time You Fall Apart
7. The Youth Are Plastic
8. Singing Sores Make Perfect Swords
9. A Tune and a Comfortable Ride
10. Let's Talk Radar
11. I Am the Seldom Reared
12. High Noon
13. Eeyore Crush It

Label: K Records / Trademark Of Quality
